REQUEST_GREETING.TITLE: Donate to Ukraine
REQUEST_GREETING.FIRST_LINE: Thank you for your interest in supporting Ukraine. We have created this simple step-by-step process to help you get medicine and other equipment to those who need it.
REQUEST_GREETING.SECOND_LINE: To begin the process, please click or tap Start below.

STEP_ONE.TITLE: Who do you want to send items to?
STEP_ONE.FIRST_LINE: We currently have volunteers ready to receive items in the following countries. Select a country that you can pay for items in to continue.
STEP_ONE.SECOND_LINE: Select the country you wish to send items to, and click/tap continue.

STEP_TWO.TITLE: What do you want to donate?
STEP_TWO.FIRST_LINE: These items are required for frontline troops. Select one of the items below. Those in red are high priority items. Note the price is approximate.

STEP_THREE.TITLE: Add to your basket(s)
STEP_THREE.FIRST_LINE: We have found the following links for the product listed above. Click a link to open the online shop in a new tab, and indicate how many of the item you select from each shop.

STEP_FOUR.TITLE: Would you like to donate more?
STEP_FOUR.FIRST_LINE: Would you like to register more items? If yes, you can select more
STEP_FOUR.BACK_BUTTON: Yes, I want to donate more.

STEP_FIVE.TITLE: Complete your order
STEP_FIVE.FIRST_LINE: You can now complete your order(s) on the chosen websites. Please send them to the address listed.
STEP_FIVE.SECOND_LINE: Once you have completed your purchases, please confirm that by uploading order screenshots. Be sure to avoid any personal information.

STEP_SIX.TITLE: Thank you
STEP_SIX.FIRST_LINE: We have recorded your order in our inventory. We really appreciate your support. Thank you for supporting Ukraine.
STEP_SIX.SECOND_LINE: If you want to order another item, click order another item. Otherwise, you can now close this tab.
